Question.Subject: SKYPE Question.(10 points to best answer)!!!?
Question.Content: What do I need to call landlines and cellphones?(other than Skype credit) Do I need a special microphone,or a headset?or something like that. I have a microphone and speakers built into my laptop. Thanks
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Nope, it's just like a regular skype call. The quality is generally a little worse than you would expect from a handset or landline phone, as you are talking to a laptop and all. Then again, it does depend on how good your built in mic is.
But they do have a reputation for being notoriously bad. If you were planning on using Skype to make a lot of landline calls, I'd recommend picking up a good headset, just so people can hear you better.

Answer.Content: That's fine. I'm pretty sure that's all you need aside from Skype credit.
Answer.Reference: My sister has done it before.

Answer.Content: All younee is a mic and speakers with the skype creidt =]

Nope, it's just like a regular skype call. The quality is generally a little worse than you would expect from a handset or landline phone, as you are talking to a laptop and all. Then again, it does depend on how good your built in mic is.
But they do have a reputation for being notoriously bad. If you were planning on using Skype to make a lot of landline calls, I'd recommend picking up a good headset, just so people can hear you better.
Answer.Reference: I do a lot of Skype, I've almost phased out having a cell phone! It's great. No expiry on skype credit, beats pay as you go. Just need internet everywhere!
